segments.text: Hello , may I speak with the property manager , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is the property manager . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: During that horrible rainstorm last night , my roof began to leak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What room was the leak in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you on the top floor , or is there another apartment above you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are on the top floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be sending someone out as soon as I can get hold of the roofer . Will you be home this morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . If you do end up going somewhere , we can just use our pass key .
segments.speaker: S2
